title: Losing Lp after a win
body: I lost lp after a win. Now i don't think that is normal? I was on 16 lp then won a game while then network went down, as in after my game ranked went offline (march 1st). Afterwards i was on 9 Lp, so i lost 7 and didn't get my win which is 16 lp. I played one more game to see if it updated after i logged out then in again, however after a win I was only on 26, (9+ 17). I still dont have my lp from the previous win and lost 7 lp, i should have an extra 23lp!! Riot please help me?

replies.body: yo, was on 86 lp, won, said i got 18 lp, after i logged back in i was on 6 lp..... and now i have to continue from 6 lp
People have been demoted after a win. Losing a few lp isn't that big a deal.
Regardless, would you w\like losing Lp after a win?

[It was a bug that was occurring last night. It's why they temporarily shut down ranked queues.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dbkjXlyL-known-issue-1st-march-2017-ranked-lp-gains-not-correct)
The same happen to me. I gain 20 lp after a win but after the rank went down, that win didn't give me points even though the win is still in my match history.
